resources.string: Shakib Al Hasan is a Bangladeshi cricketer and current captain in Test and T20I cricket of Bangladesh national cricket team./n He is ranked no 1 all-rounder in ICC ODI Players rankings. /n He employs an aggressive left-handed batting style in the middle order and controlled slow left-arm orthodox bowling.

Mohammad Mahmudullah, also known as Riyad, is a Bangladeshi cricketer. /n He has played First-class and List A cricket for Dhaka Division and has represented Bangladesh in all forms of the game./n An all-rounder, he is a lower or middle-order batsman as well as an off spin bowle
Mashrafe Bin Mortaza is a Bangladeshi international cricketer and politician/n who is the former captain in all three formats of the game for the Bangladesh national cricket team

Mushfiqur Rahim is a Bangladeshi cricketer and the former captain and vice-captain of the Bangladesh national cricket team./n He is considered as the most successful captain of Bangladesh in Test cricket.

Tamim Iqbal Khan, more popularly known as Tamim Iqbal, is a Bangladeshi cricketer./n He is currently the captain of the Bangladesh national team in One Day Internationals./n Tamim made his ODI debut in 2007 and played his first Test match the following year.
